content: I just want to make sure that I'm doing this right as I normally just reference SNOMED CT but my project has some SNOMED US codes. When I'm creating my valueset, I should be using the following URI for the codesystem: http://snomed.info/sct/731000124108, correct? Assuming that is correct, the "unable to provide support for code system" error I get from the server is just because the terminology server knows about SNOMED CT but not about SNOMED US, correct?
no. it's still the same code system. You nominate the US edition in the version
okay, I looked at the SNOMED CT page and I couldn't parse what you meant by "nominate the US edition in the version". Do you mean in the value set version?
